long_description: With a fun all-over print and Mary Jane-style rip-and-stick adjustable instep strap, the Chooze Dance shoes are a great choice for little girls who love to twirl. Canvas uppers and linings are soft and breathable, yet highly durable; stretch trim hugs the feet; toe box is roomy. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort; lightweight wood plates provide support and stability. Rubber outsoles provide sure footing and help protect little feet. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: With a fun all-over print and Mary Jane-style rip-and-stick adjustable instep strap, the Chooze Dance shoes are a great choice for little girls who love to twirl.
